description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Play Fetch, Soccer, Capture the flag, Race or Chase with or against friends and family. You can choose to play campaign, co-op campaign or tournament. There's also a party mode where you can play tournaments with up to 16 players on a single Xbox 360. By automatically using computer replacements, people can join and leave the game as they come and go, without disrupting the ongoing tournament.
description.short: Play Fetch, Soccer, Capture the flag, Race or Chase with or against friends and family. You can choose to play campaign, co-op campaign or tournament. There's also a party mode where you can play tournaments with up to 16 players on a single Xbox 360.
